New Records: Brenton Doyle finished a triple short of the cycle
Brendan Rodgers hit solo homers in the third and fourth innings
Drew Romo hit a two-run double
Key Match Events: The game was high-scoring with 20 runs and 30 hits
The Marlins scored a season-high 18 hits
The Marlins had a four-run fourth inning
The Marlins came back after a rough fourth inning for Bradley Blalock
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Blalock commented on his performance
Miami manager Bud Black discussed Blalock's challenges
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game lasted two hours and 58 minutes
Jesus Tinoco picked up his first career victory
Others: Derek Hill led the Marlins with three hits and two home runs
